channel.title: Ritzscape 2014-2015. Need team
channel.description:
Hey guys, im pretty sure this is sorta in the right place :confused: :confused:
First off im new here, No one knows me lol. I only hosted once so I decided why not bring back ritzscape 2014 and see whats that like. Maybe some people would say "Ritzscape sucks", honestly I know and thats why I want to bring back and see where it went worng.
I played ritzscape, was the first private server i ever played lol.
Ok well, everyone who played ritzscape might have or might not have liked it. I thought about bringing it back now just copying everything but add in my own features for example coloured yell and all that. I am looking for a team and if you want too see what it looks like i'm happy to post pictures of it. Im looking for a team of coders and a few testers who are willing too download hamachi and test the server.
I dont know if this is alowed or not but i am looking for a hoster too. No im not willing to pay for you but all donations will go to you if you wish.
I am looking for: Client coder Hoster (Hopefully)
Heres how too apply.
Age:
Why should you be picked as a *?:
What are you applying for? (Shows me what you want to do around the server, if you help us out)
Do you have hamachi? (Only way i can contact you)
Do you have any experience at all? (I dont care if you worked on major server or minor servers. I want to see if you can help my server)

item.title: Ritzscape 2014-2015. Need team
item.dc:creator: @killa_kronic killa kronic
item.description:
@killa_kronic wrote:

Gromic:

Which version are you trying to work with?

317 but i also need coders for when im out. Also if you wanna check the server then check out www.projectcustomscape.smfnew2.com

Read full topic
